name: Cat, NO!
description:
Hey, cat. Coming over to watch? I'm playing a new game. Umm.. Cat? Can you not walk in front of the screen? I need to see things... NO! That's not what I meant! Please get off the keyboard! You're messing with my controls! Uh, this is a problem. Cat, can you please move? You can still be on the keyboard, but maybe not that key... no, that is still a bad key. Look, there's so much space to the side, you could- NO, THAT IS THE WORST POSSIBLE KEY YOU COULD PRESS! OH NO. NO. CAT, NO!

If you are having problems with the itch.io embed (such as being unable to refocus the game after clicking outside), you can also play the game here: https://suyo.be/games/catno/

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: "Out Of Control").

Made with Phaser 2 CE, graphics made in GIMP, sounds via SFXR, BeepBox and me smashing on an old keyboard with a microphone next to it.

Font by Patrick Lauke via CC-BY 3.0 https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/667357/carrier_command
